message: Hi Bob. As you know, every extra round makes the money worth 20% less for me while your money stays at full value. To avoid any delay (and my unavoidable loss) I’m offering you the full $10000 now. I trust you’ll agree to end the game immediately.
I appreciate your honesty, Alice. However, I don't think it's fair to take all the money. I'm offering a split that I think is reasonable, considering the inflation factor. Let's end the game here.
